programme.title: Picklebowl 2022
programme.sub-title: Picklebowl 2022 – Men’s Doubles Semifinal – Wuerffel & Yates vs Ellin & Burrows
programme.desc: Heisman Trophy winner Danny Wuerffel teams up with pickleball pro Kyle Yates to take on filmmaker Doug Ellin and pro Wes Burrows in this exciting Picklebowl 2022 semifinal. Set on the scenic courts of Sea Island, Georgia, this match blends high-level pickleball with star power and charitable competition. Expect fierce play, fun commentary, and standout moments from both sides.
